overview: "Monster Fire Baby" by the Blood Pumpers Racing Club was a Hyper-Mega Supercharged monster sex performance - complete with the world's first (as far as I know) live burning-monster baby birth!  Performed at WildChild Productions in downtown San Diego sometime in 1991.  The all-star cast consisted of 16 performers divided into 4 teams, the team members all wore custom uniforms labelled with a number and a color.  This is a short edit of the performance that was made to accompany an installation piece for lalapalooza's traveling art tent. Unfortunately it doesn't convey the intensity of the show, a longer edit and all the original footage were lost, leaving this as the only document.
tagline: Hyper-Mega Supercharged monster sex performance - complete with the world's first live burning-moster baby birth!
title: Blood Pumpers Racing Club
